benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/payments - Trigger a payment (authorization, purchase or credit)

covered: GET -> Query Parameters: Tests validate multiple query parameters in payment trigger requests.
GET -> Authorization: Tests cover unauthorized/invalid authentication scenarios (TC20).
POST -> Valid Payload: Successful payments with required/optional fields.
POST -> Invalid Payload: Handling malformed payloads and invalid fields.
POST -> Large Payloads: Handling very large payloads (TC05).
POST -> Validation: Currency and numeric validations (TC16, TC17, TC19).
POST -> Server Error Handling: Gateway/service failures (TC12, TC13, TC14, TC23).
recommendations: Add tests for duplicate submissions to ensure idempotency or proper handling of repeated payments.
Add rate-limiting tests to verify throttling and system behavior under burst load.
Add tests to verify caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) for the payment creation endpoint.
Consider extending coverage to PUT/PATCH/DELETE scenarios in separate stories/testify for cross-method consistency.
Introduce explicit 403 Forbidden tests in addition to 401 Unauthorized to validate access control.
